pros: A gentle stability shoe; Well-cushioned; Comfortable in-shoe feel; Responsive ride; Light for its kind; Secure lockdown; Breathable; Great value for money
RR_verdict: On our wear tests, we verified that the ASICS GT 2000 11 is a solid daily trainer that ensures a stable and comfortable ride so we recommend it especially for runners who need that extra support. The integration of cutting-edge ASICS tech into this stability shoe allowed us to experience that excellent balance between a squishy and responsive run. This versatile daily trainer kept our feet happy whether it was an easy run around the block or a day-long adventure. It is a solid alternative to the brand's mighty Kayano!
awards: Top 30% in stability running shoes, Top 29% in running shoes for flat feet
use: Gym |, Jogging |, Treadmill |, Walking |, All-day wear
